plays.text: Goal scored by Zdeno Ciger assisted by Radek Dvorak and Petr Nedved
Penalty to Darren Van Impe 2 minutes for High Sticking DONALD AUDETTE
Penalty to Richard Zednik 2 minutes for Boarding David Karpa
Penalty to Eric Lindros 2 minutes for Tripping Andreas Dackell
Penalty to Tomas Kloucek 5 minutes for Kneeing Jan Bulis served by Sandy McCarthy
Penalty to Tomas Kloucek 10 minutes for Deliberate Injury Jan Bulis
Penalty to Radek Dvorak 2 minutes for Tripping Sheldon Souray
Goal scored by Yanic Perreault assisted by DONALD AUDETTE and Brian Savage
Goal scored by Mike York assisted by Eric Lindros and Theo Fleury
Penalty to DONALD AUDETTE 2 minutes for Tripping Radek Dvorak served by Brian Savage
Goal scored by Mike York assisted by Vladimir Malakhov
